title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 920.0 - Purposes and objectives
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 920.0 - Purposes and objectives

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to establish a solicitation and
award evaluation process for funds made available for statewide projects and
demonstration programs to address the needs of distressed industries and to
provide for projects that would lead to the development of innovative
strategies to meet the needs of dislocated workers. Such projects shall
emphasize retraining and include counseling and assessment
components. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
920.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
